title: ATTN RIOT: Leaver Buster/Bug Splat
body:
RIOT!!!!

You need to figure out how to fig this bug splat/leaver buster crap. Like PRONTO. FIX THIS.

The League community has been BEGGING you to fix these issues and instead you alter Masteries and REALLY screw up the game. Wow GET YOUR PRIORITIES RIGHT!!! YOU ARE LETTING DOWN THE LEAGUE COMMUNITY!!!!
